data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture shows the remains of the Temple of Aphaia. It is the most important archaeological site on the island of Aegina and in fact one of the most important in all of Greece. The Temple sits on top of a mountain above the resort town of Agia Marina. And it dates back to around 500 BC. In Greek mythology, Aphaia was a Greek goddess, the daughter of Zeus, who was worshipped exclusively at this sanctuary. From what I can see from the picture, the Temple is primarily built of limestone and is in ivory color. It is built on a level foundation, and there are numerous huge columns and beams. Despite the fact that it is merely wreckage, it still gives me a great sense of magnificence. (129字)
